name: SlendyFreddy: Nightmare Edition
description:
Last episode of Slendyfreddy, now with the Nightmare Animatronics

Story Mode: Discover the story behind the saga.

Springlock Mode: Collect 10 Springlocks

Note: This will be different: you will have a story behind. but as it will take a while to be done, I decided to release the springlock mode before.
